subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN2624, how did it go?
description_text:
Haven’t received it yet.  


Sent from Yahoo Mail for iPhone


On Friday, September 26, 2025, 12:13 PM, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

| Hello MAINT SUP, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. conversations.body_text: Hello, may I ask if you have contacted the logistics company?  phone:  +1 1949 688 6032

I did and they say sent it back to you. 
jeff gibson
